summary: WaywardKnight\'s NPC Overhaul featuring the citizens of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Myriad Pro][SIZE=7][I][B]WaywardKnight\'s Characters featuring the citizens of Riverwood[/B][/I][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype] [/FONT][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5]

[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5]A complete modular character overhaul featuring the townsfolk of Riverwood. 

Each tweak was meticulously designed to give each NPCs a greater sense of life and character to aid immersion and help build the world Bethesda worked so hard to create. [/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5]
Each NPC was created and packaged in a separate set complete with the necessary .nif and .esp files to allow you, the user, greater customization and usability.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5]Feel free to drop me a line if you have any questions, comments, or concerns about this or any of my other mods. [/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype]
[/FONT][/SIZE]

[URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m0PHG.png[/IMG][/URL]

[FONT=Arial Black][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554]Skyrim NPC Editor 0.75.1[/URL][/FONT]
author: WaywardKnight
